    | text      = a ton of interviews that he was a CEO.

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:31.200

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.600

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:08.720
    | text      = Sebastian was the CEO of a company called wetter spoon organic.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | timestamp = 00:15:25.759
    | text      = do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:26.240
    | text      = They also promote their honey as having antibacterial properties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:29.840
    | text      = Interestingly, that's not a problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:31.200
    | text      = Honey absolutely does have antibacterial properties, but wetter spoon has been accused of exaggerating
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:36.639
    | text      = their honey's powers on that front.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:38.480
    | text      = And in March 2015, they were hit with a class action lawsuit for it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:42.480

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:47.759
    | text      = got withdrawn haven't been made public.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:49.679

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:54.159
    | text      = they reached some sort of out-of-court settlement, but it's hard to say for sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:57.919
    | text      = So wetter spoon organic sells all sorts of honey-based products.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.879

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:52.480

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = And, um, I, um, had offices in Pennsylvania, UK, New Zealand.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:45.619
    | text      = And in 2011, um, I had, um, basically a dream that, uh, was a common dream.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:53.299

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:17.220

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It was a very brief moment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:26.019
    | text      = When I woke up in the morning, um, I went to work and that, uh, boy, uh, that face,

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = uh, was still in front of me all day long and it was highly disturbing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = So he had a bad dream in 2011.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:41.220
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:41.779
    | text      = He had a weird dream of a kid, uh, who had weird eyes, smiling, and I maybe had a chin or not.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:08.420

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 01:20:34.699
    | text      = I have no idea why, but I have to go there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:37.619
    | text      = And she looked at me and said, are you joking?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:41.140

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Yeah.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Mount Shasta that sparks some curiosity in the part of Sebastian Martin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:22.819
    | text      = I was interested in history and I said, oh, what's the lodge about?

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = So she gave me a book about the history of the lodge and who built it and so on.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:36.100

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:18.859

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:25.260

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:20.340
    | text      = So he meets up the next morning with this guy who wrote the book about Mount Shasta

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:44.100

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
